name: A Faerie Chessie End
description:
A "20 Second Game Jam" submission.

A short game of Faerie Chess made for DragonRuby's 20sec game jam.

To win you must Capture the opposing king...
20 seconds on the clock. Split between you and your opponent (the computer).

I didn't realize until way to far into the project that it was supposed to be: "min_time = max_time = 20sec", and not: "max_time = 20sec."
